name: Basil Julep
instructions:
1. Muddle 2-3 basil leaves with gum syrup in a julep cup
2. Fill with crushed ice and add whiskey
3. Stir until cold and frosty, then top with more crushed ice
description: Pick a high-character Irish Whiskey - something with rich, oily spice notes to pull down the basil's volatile peppery aroma.

ingredients.name: Irish whiskey
ingredients.description: Produced in Ireland, often made from a mix of malted and unmalted barley and aged for a minimum period in wooden casks. Styles include single malt, single pot still, blended Irish whiskey, and others.

ingredients.name: Simple Syrup
ingredients.description: Syrup made with sugar and water. Usually in 1:1 or 2:1 ratio.

ingredients.name: Basil
ingredients.description: Basil is an annual, or sometimes perennial, herb used for its leaves.
